Name: Add ColorPaletteViews
Description: This project demonstrates how to add RadColorPaletteViews bound to custom colors to the RadColorPicker control. In this sample project, we are going to use the AdditionalContent property of the RadColorPicker.
KeyWords: Add ColorPaletteViews,  colorpaletteviews, custom, colors, additionalcontent

Name: Custom Palette View Item Tooltip
Description: This project demonstrates how to use the PaletteItemsTemplate property of the ColorPicker. It is useful in data-binding scenarios where you need to apply a custom template on the PaletteViewItems. In this example is demonstarted how to use it to define a tooltip for the palette items.
KeyWords: Custom Palette View Item Tooltip,  databinding, mvvm, paletteitemstemplate
